languages.text: "Ты лишь бродишь во тьме. Ищешь свет... но все никак не найдешь. Правда не видишь?"
"You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
languages.original_text: "Ты лишь бродишь во тьме. Ищешь свет... но все никак не найдешь. Правда не видишь?"

traits.locale_text: "You're merely wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
"You're merely wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
"You're merely wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
"You're merely wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
"You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
"You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

languages.text: «Estás vagando por las sombras. Busca la luz... pero no está por ninguna parte. ¿De verdad no la ves?».
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

traits.locale_text: «Estás vagando por las sombras. Busca la luz... pero no está por ninguna parte. ¿De verdad no la ves?».

languages.text: 「お前は、ただ暗闇の中をさまよっているだけ。光を探して…でもどこにも見つからない。本当に見えない？」
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は、ただ暗闇の中をさまよっているだけ。光を探して…でもどこにも見つからない。本当に見えない？」

languages.text: “你在黑暗里游荡，寻找光明……但光明却无处可寻。你真的看不出来吗？”
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

traits.locale_text: “你在黑暗里游荡，寻找光明……但光明却无处可寻。你真的看不出来吗？”

languages.text: "Ihr wandert nur in der Dunkelheit umher. Auf der Suche nach dem Licht ... aber es ist nirgends zu finden. Seht Ihr es wirklich nicht?"
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wandert nur in der Dunkelheit umher. Auf der Suche nach dem Licht ... aber es ist nirgends zu finden. Seht Ihr es wirklich nicht?"

languages.text: « Vous ne faites qu'errer dans l'obscurité. Vous cherchez la lumière... mais elle est introuvable. Vous ne la voyez donc pas ? »
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne faites qu'errer dans l'obscurité. Vous cherchez la lumière... mais elle est introuvable. Vous ne la voyez donc pas ? »

languages.text: "Karanlıkta dolaşıp duruyorsun. Işığı arıyorsun ama... Işık yok ki bulasın. Gerçekten onu görmüyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "You're just wandering around in the dark. Looking for the light... but it's nowhere to be found. Do you really not see it?"
